stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Material 3 Expressive design
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching, sorting and grid style options
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Many visual overhauls & redesigns
‚Ä¢ Many bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`dd96e97`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/dd96e97c04cd91c489cb7ab5c89e7d924222d70f) - **Media overlay**: Toolbar animation and elevation, adapt system bars to light theme *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c5c5006`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c5c5006cee7d9deae4da39e4d3957332e878d29d) - UI improvements here and there *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c290e05`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c290e05dff3a66a6ce8cbe7a37f1ba16da0b43b8) - **Updates screen**: UI improvements *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`edd4fd7`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/edd4fd746410ddcf4e49e31e4c241b0a0016a9f4) - Ability to report caught errors *(PR #99 by @aliernfrog)*
- [`37167e8`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/37167e82d0db41fb32aca4a7d5b1c5c4141aa624) - **Maps list**: Separate pager and header *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`21e775d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/21e775d6ed3895210bf544f9e99320a0c2322340) - Improve toast contrast and animations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`c682b4e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c682b4ef6372de4698399f1e075cd4fc5f897d63) - **Permissions**: Check if given path is a directory *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`637710d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/637710dddfd811fd1d343f097d89bce05c1698a6) - **Updates screen**: Use latest release info, add missing elevation to toolbar *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`c57f634`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/c57f6344a5b060f795fa98a5fe776b6cbb9f1a64) - **Updates**: Restore update badge on settings button *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`bfb4a76`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/bfb4a768d5c9882892e3a41775007adc495b48f3) - **Maps**: Avoid duplicating navigation entry *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`6a81339`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/6a8133995ab8eefee3e4e853a97b192147b1f203) - **Updates screen**: Do not show open in browser label if not enough space *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`30a2c08`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/30a2c0878365bfc1104f396cd70c39aa90cfb677) - **FAB**: Adjust label visibility animation *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`7416e6f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7416e6fb787dfded3b967a978f32459508505327) - **Maps list**: Use full item span for grid view segment summary *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`db728bf`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/db728bf943bc9130c9e3d8f257f2708212d76282) - **Maps list**: Always show select/deselect all option when multi-selecting *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`f21743b`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f21743bfc5683be228173c9006aaecd907ca0321) - **Maps**: Do not show thumbnail share option when no thumbnail file *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### ‚ôªÔ∏è Refactors
- [`0656f1d`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/0656f1d58b235c85670a3547350495082d9ee3b3) - Correct ViewModel handling by using domains and `viewModelOf` *(PR #98 by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
‚Ä¢ Material 3 Expressive design
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching, sorting and grid style options
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Many visual overhauls & redesigns
‚Ä¢ Many bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
